Krisztián Hofstädter

semaphore

A cross-domain, multi-modal and experimental entertainment by Richard Hoadley.

time: Aug 2014

tags: visual-art, film

Semaphore is a cross-domain, multi-modal and experimental entertainment by Richard Hoadley, Phil Terry, Jane Turner. The Microsoft Kinect maps dance movements to trigger and modulate text, sound synthesis and musical notation. I recorded and edited this short film below for Richard.

Performed by Cheryl Frances-Hoad, Richard Hoadley, Gwen Jones, Ann Pidcock, Kate Romano, Phil Terry

More information on Richard’s page.
